Full type safety at all execution stages

info.safeZoneHorizontal: Adjusts the horizontal boundaries of the area within which the trajectory center can move
info.safeZoneVertical: Adjusts the vertical boundaries of the area within which the trajectory center can move
info.airportEllipseHorizontalRadius: Sets the width of the elliptical trajectory around the airport
info.airportEllipseVerticalRadius: Sets the height of the elliptical trajectory around the airport
info.airportEllipseCenterXOffset: Shifts the airport trajectory center horizontally relative to its own center
info.airportEllipseCenterYOffset: Shifts the airport trajectory center vertically relative to its bottom border
info.mouseEllipseHorizontalRadius: Sets the width of the elliptical trajectory around the mouse cursor
info.mouseEllipseVerticalRadius: Sets the height of the elliptical trajectory around the mouse cursor
info.mouseEllipseRoundness: Affects the shape of the trajectory: from ellipse (0.1) to more rounded (1)
info.animationDuration: Defines the time for a full aircraft revolution along the trajectory (in milliseconds)
info.aircraftTargetWidth: Sets the displayed width of the aircraft in pixels
info.centerSmoothing: Controls the smoothness of the trajectory center's movement towards the cursor
info.ellipseSmoothing: Controls the smoothness of the trajectory size change
info.returnSpeed: Determines the speed at which the trajectory center returns to the airport when the cursor moves away
info.sensitivity: Affects the sensitivity of the aircraft's response to the cursor position
info.minVelocityThreshold: Sets the minimum aircraft speed required to change the rotation direction
info.minDistanceFactor: Determines the minimum distance to the cursor to activate a direction change
info.hysteresisThreshold: Threshold value for changing the rotation direction (prevents 'chatter')
info.hysteresisDeadZone: Dead zone within which changes are ignored
info.hysteresisTimeDelay: Minimum time between rotation direction changes
info.hysteresisAngleBuffer: Protective interval around critical points of the trajectory
info.smoothingFactor: Determines the degree of smoothing when changing the rotation direction
info.maxChangePerFrame: Limits the maximum parameter change per animation frame
info.maxTiltAngle: Sets the maximum tilt angle of the aircraft during turns (in radians)
info.tiltSmoothFactor: Controls the smoothness of the change in the aircraft's tilt angle
